items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know for certain when Mary was going to arrive.
Tom didn\'t know that Hawaii was part of the United States.
There is much more water in this lake now than in the past.
There was a crowd of people at the entrance of the theater.
Tom almost always uses a credit card when he goes shopping.
Tom told Mary that he thought John was really stressed out.
Tom took his glasses off and put them on the bedside table.
Tom took out his cell phone so that he could take a selfie.
Tom translated the French letter into English for his boss.
Tom tried to not let everyone know how much pain he was in.
